statements: SELECT * FROM MessageContent WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text FROM MessageContent WHERE is_abusive = TRUE;
SELECT message_id, message_text, is_abusive FROM MessageContent ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MessageContent WHERE message_text LIKE '%example%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_messages FROM MessageContent WHERE is_abusive = FALSE;
SELECT message_text FROM MessageContent WHERE is_abusive = False;
SELECT message_text, is_abusive FROM MessageContent ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM MessageContent WHERE is_abusive = True AND message_id > 1000;
SELECT message_id, is_abusive FROM MessageContent WHERE message_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT distinct is_abusive FROM MessageContent ORDER BY message_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM message_content;
SELECT content FROM message_content;
SELECT message_id, content FROM message_content ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM abusive_keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%abusive%';
SELECT keyword FROM abusive_keywords ORDER BY keyword ASC;
SELECT * FROM message_content WHERE message_id = 1;
SELECT content FROM message_content WHERE message_id = 3;
SELECT message_id, content FROM message_content WHERE content LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM abusive_keywords WHERE keyword LIKE '%abuse%' ORDER BY keyword ASC;
SELECT message_id AS ID, content AS Message FROM message_content WHERE content LIKE '%exciting%' ORDER BY message_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM message_content_analysis;
SELECT message FROM message_content_analysis WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, message FROM message_content_analysis WHERE is_abusive = TRUE;
SELECT word FROM abusive_words ORDER BY word ASC;
SELECT message_id, word_id FROM message_word_mapping WHERE word_id = 3;
SELECT message, is_abusive FROM message_content_analysis WHERE is_abusive = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM abusive_words ORDER BY word DESC;

SELECT message, word FROM message_content_analysis JOIN message_word_mapping ON message_content_analysis.id = message_word_mapping.message_id JOIN abusive_words ON abusive_words.word_id = message_word_mapping.word_id;

SELECT message, COUNT(word_id) AS num_abusive_words FROM message_content_analysis JOIN message_word_mapping ON message_content_analysis.id = message_word_mapping.message_id WHERE is_abusive = TRUE GROUP BY message;
SELECT DISTINCT message FROM message_content_analysis WHERE message LIKE '%abusive%'
SELECT * FROM message;
SELECT content, created_at FROM message WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_reason, report_date FROM abuse_reports WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM blocked_users WHERE user_id = 50 AND blocked_user_id = 75;
SELECT * FROM message WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT content FROM message WHERE id = 5;
SELECT user_id, content FROM message ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT block_id, username, email FROM user JOIN blocked_users ON user.user_id = blocked_users.blocked_user_id;
SELECT u.username, m.content, ar.report_reason FROM user u JOIN message m ON u.user_id = m.user_id JOIN abuse_reports ar ON m.id = ar.message_id WHERE ar.report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Messages;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_id, message_text, sender_id FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, timestamp FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT message_text, sender_id FROM Messages WHERE sender_id = 3 OR sender_id = 5
SELECT Users.username, Users.email, COUNT(AbuseReports.report_id) AS num_reports FROM Users LEFT JOIN AbuseReports ON Users.user_id = AbuseReports.reporter_id GROUP BY Users.username
SELECT Messages.message_text, Users.username FROM Messages INNER JOIN Users ON Messages.sender_id = Users.user_id

SELECT Messages.message_id, Messages.message_text, COUNT(ReportedMessages.report_id) AS num_reports FROM Messages LEFT JOIN ReportedMessages ON Messages.message_id = ReportedMessages.message_id GROUP BY Messages.message_id ORDER BY num_reports DESC
